remarks: Projectivity from vector space H to dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mapdval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdval.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdval.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdval.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdfval $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> M = ( s e. S |-> { f e. F | ( ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) /\ ( O ` ( L ` f ) ) C_ s ) } ) ) $.
$d F f $.
$d K f s $.
$d S s $.
$d W f s $.
